group_1.narration: [textBlack:Early Morning, August 12]@[textBlack:I left the room alone because there was]@[textBlack:something I had to know. I, myself, thought]@[textBlack:there was no way I'd seen it, or if I had it]@[textBlack:was a coincidence, but the diary under the ]@[textBlack:shrine yesterday... There was a page]@[textBlack:I glanced over without thinking...]
[textBlack:My eyes just passed over it, yet, for]@[textBlack:some reason it wouldn't leave my mind.]@[textBlack:The name written in the diary was...]@@[textBlack:"Kei"]

[textBlack:When I reached the shrine among the]@[textBlack:pine trees, it was right in front of the]@[textBlack:shrine's lattice door, waiting for me.]@[textBlack:I was certain I'd put it underneath the]@[textBlack:shrine... Someone must've moved it.]@[textBlack:At least, that's what I chose to believe.]
